title: Login page not loading
description: Users are unable to access the login page on mobile devices.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Transactions are failing with a 502 error during checkout.

title: Profile picture upload fails
description: Users cannot upload profile pictures larger than 2MB.

title: Email notifications delayed
description: Some users report receiving email notifications hours late.

title: Search functionality slow
description: Search results take longer than 10 seconds to load.

title: Incorrect invoice total
description: Invoices are showing incorrect totals after applying discounts.

title: Mobile app crash on startup
description: The Android app crashes immediately after launch on version 12.

title: Password reset link expired
description: Users report that password reset links expire immediately after requesting.

title: Dashboard charts not updating
description: Real-time metrics on the dashboard do not refresh automatically.

title: Typo in FAQ section
description: Several spelling mistakes found in the FAQ content.

title: Notification sound not playing
description: Desktop notifications are silent even though settings are enabled.

title: Data export CSV corrupted
description: Exported CSV files have missing headers and broken formatting.

title: Slow image loading
description: Images on the homepage take too long to load on slow connections.

title: Error 404 on FAQ page
description: FAQ page returns 404 for some users on mobile devices.

title: App theme not saving
description: User-selected dark/light theme does not persist across sessions.

title: Broken link in footer
description: The 'Contact Us' link in the footer returns a 500 error.

title: Video autoplay not working
description: Homepage video does not autoplay on Safari browser.

title: Search suggestions missing
description: Search bar does not show suggestions while typing for some users.
